const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "my-knn-index",
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      "my-vector": {
        type: "dense_vector",
        dims: 3,
        index: true,
        similarity: "l2_norm",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
